title: SPECIFIC THERAPEUTIC ACTIVITY OF CHEMICAL COMPOUNDS OR MEDICINAL PREPARATIONS
informative_references: Preparations brought into direct contact with the skin for affording protection against external influences, e.g. sunlight, X-rays or other harmful rays, corrosive materials, bacteria or insect stings
special_rules: In this subclass, all of the different therapeutic activities stated in the claims and also significantly disclosed as examples in the disclosure are classified in all appropriate places.The classification symbols of this subclass are not listed first when assigned to patent documents.
glossary_of_terms: Drug(s)Includes chemical compounds or compositions with therapeutic activity, i.e. having the ability to cause a physiological, pharmacological or biological effect.
definition_statement: This place covers: Therapeutic activity of chemical compounds or medicinal preparations.

title: Drugs for disorders of the alimentary tract or the digestive system
definition_statement: This place covers: Drugs, including chemical compounds, compositions, or medicinal preparations having therapeutic activity wherein such activity is used to treat disorders of the alimentary tract or the digestive system.

title: Drugs for disorders of the metabolism  (of the blood or the extracellular fluid A61P7/00)
definition_statement: This place covers: Drugs, including chemical compounds, compositions, or medicinal preparations having therapeutic activity wherein such activity is used to treat metabolic disorders.

title: Drugs for disorders of the endocrine system
definition_statement: This place covers: Drugs, including chemical compounds, compositions, or medicinal preparations having therapeutic activity wherein such activity is used to treat disorders of the endocrine system.

title: Drugs for disorders of the blood or the extracellular fluid
definition_statement: This place covers: Drugs, including chemical compounds, compositions, or medicinal preparations having therapeutic activity wherein such activity is used to treat disorders of the blood or the extracellular fluid.

title: Drugs for disorders of the cardiovascular system
definition_statement: This place covers: Drugs, including chemical compounds, compositions, or medicinal preparations having therapeutic activity wherein such activity is used to treat disorders of the cardiovascular system.

title: Drugs for disorders of the respiratory system
definition_statement: This place covers: Drugs, including chemical compounds, compositions, or medicinal preparations having therapeutic activity wherein such activity is used to treat disorders of the respiratory system.

title: Drugs for disorders of the urinary system
definition_statement: This place covers: Drugs, including chemical compounds, compositions, or medicinal preparations having therapeutic activity wherein such activity is used to treat disorders of the urinary system.

title: Drugs for genital or sexual disorders  (for disorders of sex hormones A61P5/24); Contraceptives
definition_statement: This place covers: Drugs, including chemical compounds, compositions, or medicinal preparations having therapeutic activity wherein such activity is used to treat genital or sexual disorders. This group also covers contraceptives.

title: Drugs for dermatological disorders
definition_statement: This place covers: Drugs, including chemical compounds, compositions, or medicinal preparations having therapeutic activity wherein such activity is used to treat dermatological disorders.

title: Drugs for skeletal disorders
definition_statement: This place covers: Drugs, including chemical compounds, compositions, or medicinal preparations having therapeutic activity wherein such activity is used to treat skeletal disorders.

title: Drugs for disorders of the muscular or neuromuscular system
definition_statement: This place covers: Drugs, including chemical compounds, compositions, or medicinal preparations having therapeutic activity wherein such activity is used to treat disorders of the muscular or neuromuscular system.

title: Anaesthetics
definition_statement: This place covers: Drugs, including chemical compounds, compositions, or medicinal preparations having anaesthetic activity.

title: Drugs for disorders of the nervous system
definition_statement: This place covers: Drugs, including chemical compounds, compositions, or medicinal preparations having therapeutic activity wherein such activity is used to treat disorders of the nervous system.

title: Drugs for disorders of the senses
definition_statement: This place covers: Drugs, including chemical compounds, compositions, or medicinal preparations having therapeutic activity wherein such activity is used to treat disorders of the senses.

title: Non-central analgesic, antipyretic or anti-inflammatory agents, e.g antirheumatic agents; Non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs (NSAIDs)
definition_statement: This place covers: Drugs, including chemical compounds, compositions, or medicinal preparations having non-central analgesic, antipyretic, anti-inflammatory, or antirheumatic activity. This group also includes non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs (NSAIDS)

title: Antiinfectives, i.e. antibiotics, antiseptics, chemotherapeutics
definition_statement: This place covers: Drugs, including chemical compounds, compositions, or medicinal preparations having therapeutic activity wherein such activity is anti-infective, antibiotic, or antiseptic. This group also covers chemotherapeutics.

title: Antiparasitic agents
definition_statement: This place covers: Drugs, including chemical compounds, compositions, or medicinal preparations having antiparasitic activity.

title: Antineoplastic agents
definition_statement: This place covers: Drugs, including chemical compounds, compositions, or medicinal preparations having antineoplastic activity.

title: Drugs for immunological or allergic disorders
definition_statement: This place covers: Drugs, including chemical compounds, compositions, or medicinal preparations having therapeutic activity wherein such activity is used to treat immunological or allergic disorders.

title: General protective or antinoxious agents
definition_statement: This place covers: Drugs, including chemical compounds, compositions, or medicinal preparations having general protective or antinoxious activity.

title: Drugs used in surgical methods, e.g. surgery adjuvants for preventing adhesion or for vitreum substitution
definition_statement: This place covers: Drugs, including chemical compounds, compositions, or medicinal preparations having therapeutic activity wherein such activity is used in surgical processes.

title: Drugs for specific purposes, not provided for in groups A61P1/00-A61P41/00
definition_statement: This place covers: Drugs, including chemical compounds, compositions, or medicinal preparations having therapeutic activity or purpose not provided for in groups   -  .
